title: HAVELSAN Showcases Autonomous Swarm Drone Capabilities Under Its “Digital Troops” Concept
desc: https://youtu.be/7JwiWuv5WR8 HAVELSAN demonstrated its autonomous swarm drone capabilities through a live field activity conducted with a swarm of POYRAZ Quadcopter drones, showcasing kamikaze and multi-target engagement capabilities within a realistic operational scenario. The demonstration attracted strong interest from senior civilian and military officials. The activity validated the end-to-end performance of HAVELSAN’s distributed swarm architecture, which…

title: Harry Kane and Luis Diaz on target for Bayern but Vincent Kompany's side need goal-line clearance from Alphonso Davies to preserve point against Hamburg
desc: Bayern Munich dropped points in the Bundesliga for the second consecutive game as they struggled to a 2-2 draw against Hamburg in north Germany. Harry Kane and Luis Diaz had put the league leaders ahead after Fabio Vieira's first-half penalty, but the hosts battled back through the impressive Luka Vuskovic to take a point in a thrilling encounter at Volksparkstadion.

title: Full circle: Former childhood cancer patient now a nurse at OSMH
